item.title: About Us
item.description: Drone Tech Company is focused on meeting Saudi Arabia’s growing national defense and commercial needs by offering cost-effective, high-performance UAVs and drone services. By leveraging local expertise and reducing dependence on foreign technology, the company aims to position itself as a leader in the UAV industry. In addition to UAV design and manufacturing, Drone Tech Company provides a range of drone services, including aerial mapping, surveillance, and remote sensing, to support both defense and commercial sectors. These services, combined with cutting-edge UAV technology, enable the company to contribute to the global aerospace supply chain while enhancing national capabilities. The company’s phased approach ensures that it can scale production efficiently while maintaining a focus on high-quality performance, competitive pricing, and local manufacturing.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
GET IN TOUCH

At Drone Tech Company, we’re passionate about innovation and delivering top-tier UAV solutions. Whether you need advanced drones, expert engineering, or customized services, we’re here to exceed your expectations. Let’s take your capabilities to new heights! Reach out today—we’re excited to work with you!

Contact us :

  • +966-538131599
  • www.dtidrone.com
  • info@dtidrone.com

item.title: Drone Services
item.description:
1. Survey & aerial Mapping

We offer precise survey and aerial mapping services using advanced UAV technology, enabling accurate topographic data collection, land use planning, and environmental monitoring with high-resolution imagery.

In today’s rapidly evolving world, the demand for accurate and comprehensive mapping and surveying has never been greater. Aerial mapping technologies, powered by drones and advanced imaging techniques, have revolutionized the way we gather and analyze data for urban planning, infrastructure development, environmental assessments, and agricultural management. By capturing high-resolution images and precise geographical information, these technologies facilitate informed decision-making, enhance project efficiency, and promote sustainable development. This document explores the key applications of aerial mapping in urban planning, infrastructure, area profiling, and agricultural services.

item.title: Wind Tunnels
item.description: The Advanced Low Speed Wind Tunnel is a state-of-the-art, closed-circuit wind tunnel featuring a rectangular test section.
